title: EM01 and EM05 Emote Error and Runepages dont save
body:
Since a few days i encounter the Bug EM01 and EM05 and also that Runepages are gone after every gamerestart. My game is not interferring with anyfirewall and i also followed your conninction guides and die the repair, and also the reinstall option. So is there any other thing i can do?

greetings a sad Summoner :({{summoner:11}}

replies.body: I'll be reaching out again to see if there have been any recent updates, but last I checked this is something we're still working on getting fixed overall. Most players I've had replies from have been able to either refresh their client, connection, or both and these errors stopped happening. Please let me know if this works for anyone, or if they seem to get around this issue with other methods!
I have repair the client and it did not work.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=16JEgtBb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-01-29T22:18:59.435+0000)
>
> I'll be reaching out again to see if there have been any recent updates, but last I checked this is something we're still working on getting fixed overall. Most players I've had replies from have been able to either refresh their client, connection, or both and these errors stopped happening. Please let me know if this works for anyone, or if they seem to get around this issue with other methods!

Mine randomly startet working again yesterday. i changed nothing so atm i really dont understand it :D

I have exactly the same problem, if i try to go to the emotes tab i get  these errors and nothing happens. And for runes they simply do not save like yours. I could not find answers on the internet  .{{champion:164}}
same here. emote doesn't appear, rune page cancelled every time i log, getting S or higher doesn't give chest, loot gives error.
